channel.title: bpf verifier on LeonHwang's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in bpf verifier on LeonHwang's Blogs

item.title: eBPF Talk: bpf verifier 报告 ENOSPC
item.description: 今天遇到个不常见的问题：在往内核装载 bpf 程序时，bpf verifier 报告错误： 1 failed to load bpf with bitmap size 8: failed to load bpf obj and bpf maps: field Acl: program acl: load program: no space left on device: 578: R0=map_value(id=0,off=0,ks=8,vs=64,imm=0) R1_w=map_ptr(id=0,off=0,ks=4,vs=4,imm=0) R2_w=fp-4 R3_w=invP1 R4=invP(id=69 (3524 line(s) omitted) 觉
